page.title: 04SANDPIT FARM,NORTH KYME
page.content: We visited{Sandpit Farm}owned by Mr. C.Dring. His family have farmed 205 acres since 1898 and the land is called{Black Fen land}and is drained into{Anwick Fen Drain.}At the farm they have 5 tractors and 11 sheds.In one of the sheds they store potatoes. There is a fan which keeps the potatoes cool and stops them from rotting. In a new shed they keep tractors called Internationals and a beet drill, trailer, a combine bed, a wheat drill and a beet hoe for the front of the tractor. There is a corndrier which holds 300 tonnes. Then we went in the Combine shed which had 160 tonnes of grain and a combine. Then we went in the crewyard which had a plough and some chitting boxws in. Mr. Dring has 17 fields in which are grown potatoes, wheat, sugar beet and barley.
